Well, I've just had my last piano lesson. I won't be going back again for other lessons. I'll still be playing the piano, of course, but I'll be learning by myself. The weird thing is that I have been going to piano lessons for the last 7 or 8 years which is about half of my life. It just seems odd that that has ended. I just hope that I can get this band going as it will give me a good reason to play the piano still, other than for my enjoyment.
